message.content: This question is asking about the impact of people dumping trash in the ocean on animals and plant life. Option (A) is unrelated to the impact of trash dumping. Option (B) does not make sense in the context of the question. Option (D) is unrelated to the topic and does not describe any effect on animals and plant life.
